Section.Title: Use in Cancer

ItemizedList.ListItem: Malignant pleural effusion, malignant pericardial effusion, and malignant peritoneal effusion.

Section.Para: Thiotepa is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer and as part of a regimen to prepare patients for bone marrow and stem cell transplants.
